content.1: Now in the twelfth month, that
content.2: The Jews gathered themselves together in their cities throughout all the provinces of the king Ahasuerus, to lay hand on such as sought their hurt: and no man could withstand them; for the fear of them fell upon all people.
content.3: And all the rulers of the provinces, and the lieutenants, and the deputies, and officers of the king, helped the Jews; because the fear of Mordecai fell upon them.
content.5: Thus the Jews smote all their enemies with the stroke of the sword, and slaughter, and destruction, and did what they would unto those that hated them.
content.6: And in Shushan the palace the Jews slew and destroyed five hundred men.
content.7: And Parshandatha, and Dalphon, and Aspatha,

content.10: The ten sons of Haman the son of Hammedatha, the enemy of the Jews, slew they; but on the spoil laid they not their hand.
content.11: On that day the number of those that were slain in Shushan the palace was brought before the king.
